main.name: Manuel Ramirez
main.description: I am a full time geek, in love with code and technology.
main.bio: Innovative Full Stack Web Developer with a natural knack for combining technical know-how with creative elements. Well-versed in HTML5, CSS3, Javascript, JQuery, Bootstrap, Firebase, Node, MySQL, MongoDB, Express, Handelbars.js & ReactJS. A lifelong learner and a firm believer that education should never stop. Always expanding knowledge and experience by keeping abreast of the evolving trends, techniques, and technologies to streamline efficiency. 9 years demonstrated experience working as freelance challenging myself with new code languages. Earned a bachelor's degree in Information Technology and currently pursuing a Certificate in Full Stack Web Developer at University of Central Florida. Proven ability in optimizing web functionalities that improve data retrieval and workflow efficiencies. Equipped with skills needed to create products that bring joy to the lives of the users while helping the company to achieve its goals. Bilingual, fluent in Spanish and English.
main.contactmessage: For have any questions or proposal, I will be happy to answer you as soon as possible.
